description: Connection to InfluxDB with metrics from signalk and telegraf required

targets.query:
from(bucket: "${signalk}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "depth")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["environment"] == "keel")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["id"] == "${mmsi}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.source =~ /^${sources:regex}/)
  |> drop(columns: ["id", "source"])
  |> last()

from(bucket: "${signalk}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "temperature")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "value")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["environment"] == "water")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["id"] == "${mmsi}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.source =~ /^${sources:regex}/)
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with _value: r._value -273.15}))
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> drop(columns: ["id", "source"])
  |> last()

from(bucket: "${signalk}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "temperature")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "value")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["environment"] == "outside")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["id"] == "${mmsi}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.source =~ /^${sources:regex}/)
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with _value: r._value -273.15}))
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> drop(columns: ["id", "source"])
  |> last()

from(bucket:"${signalk}")
  |> range(start:  -6h, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "pressure")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["environment"] == "outside")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "value")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["id"] == "${mmsi}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.source =~ /^${sources:regex}/)
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with _value: r._value / 100.0 }))
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 20s, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "Pressure")

from(bucket: "${signalk}")
  |> range(start: -3h, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "wind")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "speed")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["environment"] == "true")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["id"] == "${mmsi}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.source =~ /^${sources:regex}/)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["source"] == "derived-data")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with _value: r._value * 1.94384}))
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> drop(columns: ["id", "source"])
  |> last()

from(bucket: "${signalk}")
	|> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
	|> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "wind")
	|> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "speed" or r["_field"] == "direction")
	|> filter(fn: (r) => r["environment"] == "true")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["id"] == "${mmsi}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.source =~ /^${sources:regex}/)	
	|> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with _value: 
	      if r._field == "speed" 
        then ((r._value * 1.943844))
	      else ((r._value / 3.1415 * 180.0) - 90.0) 
	  }))
	|> pivot(rowKey:["_time"], columnKey: ["_field"], valueColumn: "_value")
	|> filter(fn: (r) => exists r["direction"] and exists r["speed"])
	|> drop(columns: ["id", "source"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 5m, fn: last, column: "direction", createEmpty: false)

from(bucket: "${telegraf}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "temp")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "temp")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.host == "${skhost}")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "${signalk}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "tanks")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "level")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["id"] == "${mmsi}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.source =~ /^${sources:regex}/)
	|> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with _value:  (r._value * 100.0) }))
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
	|> filter(fn: (r) => exists r["label"] and exists r["type"])
  |> group(columns: ["type", "label"])
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "${signalk}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "tanks")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "level")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["id"] == "${mmsi}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.source =~ /^${sources:regex}/)
	|> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with _value:  (r._value * 100.0) }))
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
	|> filter(fn: (r) => exists r["label"] and exists r["type"])
  |> group(columns: ["type", "label"])
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "${signalk}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "tanks")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "level")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["id"] == "${mmsi}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.source =~ /^${sources:regex}/)
	|> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with _value:  (r._value * 100.0) }))
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
	|> filter(fn: (r) => exists r["label"] and exists r["type"])
  |> group(columns: ["type", "label"])
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "${telegraf}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "temp")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "temp")
    |> filter(fn: (r) => r["host"] == "${fhost}")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "${signalk}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "temperature")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "minimum")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["environment"] == "forecast")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["forecast"] == "today")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["id"] == "${mmsi}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.source =~ /^${sources:regex}/)
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with _value: r._value -273.15}))
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 1d, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> drop(columns: ["id", "source"])
  |> yield(name: "min")

from(bucket: "${signalk}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "temperature")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "maximum")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["environment"] == "forecast")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["forecast"] == "today")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["id"] == "${mmsi}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.source =~ /^${sources:regex}/)
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with _value: r._value -273.15}))
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 1d, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> drop(columns: ["id", "source"])
  |> yield(name: "max")

from(bucket: "${signalk}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "temperature")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "value")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["environment"] == "inside")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["id"] == "${mmsi}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.source =~ /^${sources:regex}/)
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with _value: r._value -273.15}))
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> drop(columns: ["id", "source"])
  |> last()

from(bucket: "${signalk}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "temperature")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "value")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["environment"] == "fridge")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["id"] == "${mmsi}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.source =~ /^${sources:regex}/)
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with _value: r._value -273.15}))
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> drop(columns: ["id", "source"])
  |> last()

from(bucket: "${signalk}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "temperature")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "value")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["environment"] == "freezer")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["id"] == "${mmsi}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.source =~ /^${sources:regex}/)
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with _value: r._value -273.15}))
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> drop(columns: ["id", "source"])
  |> last()

import "join"
left = from(bucket: "signalk_metrics")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "batteries")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "voltage")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> drop(columns: ["id", "source"])
right = from(bucket: "signalk_metrics")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "description")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["type"] == "batteries")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> pivot(rowKey: ["label"], columnKey: ["_field"], valueColumn: "_value")
  |> keep(columns: ["label", "norm", "min", "max"])
join.left(
    left: left |> group(),
    right: right |> group(),
    on: (l, r) => l.label == r.label,
    as: (l, r) => ({l with norm: r.norm, min: r.min, max: r.max }),
  ) |> group (columns: ["label"])
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["norm"] == 12.9)
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with B: r._value }))
  |> keep(columns: ["label", "B"])

import "join"

left = from(bucket: "signalk_metrics")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "batteries")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "voltage")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> drop(columns: ["id", "source"])

right = from(bucket: "signalk_metrics")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "description")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["type"] == "batteries")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> pivot(rowKey: ["label"], columnKey: ["_field"], valueColumn: "_value")
  |> keep(columns: ["label", "norm", "min", "max"])

join.left(
    left: left |> group(),
    right: right |> group(),
    on: (l, r) => l.label == r.label,
    as: (l, r) => ({l with norm: r.norm * 5.0, min: r.min * 5.0, max: r.max * 5.0 }),
  ) |> group (columns: ["label"])
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["norm"] == 15.0)
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with B: r._value * 5.0 }))
  |> keep(columns: ["label", "B"])

list.definition:
from(bucket: v.defaultBucket)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "description")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "signalk")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["label"] == "bucket")
  |> last()
list.name: signalk

list.definition:
import "date"
import "strings"

from(bucket: "${signalk}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "time")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "sunrise")
  |> last()
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with sunrise: string(v: date.add(d: ${timezone}, to: time(v: uint(v: r._value)))) }))
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with _value: strings.substring(start: 11, end: strings.strlen(v: r.sunrise)-11, v: r.sunrise) }))
list.label: Sunrise
list.name: sunrise

from(bucket: v.defaultBucket)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement != "description")
  |> keep(columns: ["source"])
  |> distinct(column: "source")
list.label: Sources
list.name: sources
